titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to ban the acceptance of cash contributions greater than $100 in campaigns for election for Federal office.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 10/10/1998--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit candidates or political committees from accepting any contributions of currency of the United States or of any foreign country from any person which, in the aggregate, exceed $100.
